title: S1 Ep1: In The Beginning... Jason Hawes
itunes:title: In The Beginning... Jason Hawes
description: In this very first episode of Darkness Radio, Dave and Tim welcome Lead Investigator from the Ghost Hunters TV show,Jason Hawes!  The boys wanted to start the show off with a bang... but they started it off with... salsa music?! But it got better from there, as Jay gave a behind the scenes look at the show and his philosophies on investigating...
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
